verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have made <S%H5414><s%> you as God <S%H430><s%> to Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> shall be your prophet. <S%H5030><s%>

You shall speak <S%H1696><s%> all that I command <S%H6680><s%> you; <S%H175><s%> and Aaron your brother <S%H251><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> that he let <S%H7971><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go out of his land. <S%H776><s%>
I will harden <S%H7185><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart, <S%H3820><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> my signs <S%H226><s%> and my wonders <S%H4159><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

But Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to you, <S%H5414><s%> and I will lay my hand <S%H3027><s%> on Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and bring out <S%H3318><s%> my armies, <S%H6635><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by great <S%H1419><s%> judgments. <S%H8201><s%>

The Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> on Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and bring out <S%H3318><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from among them. <S%H8432><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3068><s%> As Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, <S%H6213><s%> so they did.

Moses <S%H4872><s%> was eighty <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%>- three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> when they spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"When Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> to you, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H5414><s%> 'Perform a miracle! <S%H4159><s%>' then you shall tell <S%H559><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> <S%H3947><s%> 'Take your rod, <S%H4294><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> it down before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> that it become a serpent. <S%H8577><s%>'"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and they did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh had commanded: <S%H6680><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> cast down <S%H7993><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and it became a serpent. <S%H8577><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> also called <S%H7121><s%> for the wise men <S%H2450><s%> and the sorcerers. <S%H3784><s%> They also, <S%H2748><s%> the magicians of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the same thing <S%H3651><s%> with their enchantments. <S%H3858><s%>

For they each <S%H376><s%> cast down <S%H7993><s%> their rods, <S%H4294><s%> and they became serpents: <S%H8577><s%> but Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s rod <S%H4294><s%> swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> their rods. <S%H4294><s%>
Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> and he didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to them; <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh had spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> is stubborn. <S%H3515><s%> He refuses <S%H3985><s%> to let the people <S%H5971><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

Go to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> in the morning. <S%H1242><s%> Behold, <S%H3318><s%> he goes out to the water; <S%H4325><s%> and you shall stand <S%H5324><s%> by the river <S%H2975><s%>'s bank <S%H8193><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him; <S%H4294><s%> and the rod which was turned <S%H2015><s%> to a serpent <S%H5175><s%> you shall take <S%H3947><s%> in your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

You shall tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%>" and behold, <S%H8085><s%> until now you haven't listened.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "In this you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H5221><s%> I will strike with the rod <S%H4294><s%> that is in my hand <S%H3027><s%> on the waters <S%H4325><s%> which are in the river, <S%H2975><s%> and they shall be turned <S%H2015><s%> to blood. <S%H1818><s%>

The fish <S%H1710><s%> that are in the river <S%H2975><s%> shall die, <S%H4191><s%> and the river <S%H2975><s%> shall become foul; <S%H887><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall loathe <S%H3811><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from the river. <S%H2975><s%>"'"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Tell Aaron, <S%H175><s%> <S%H3947><s%> 'Take your rod, <S%H4294><s%> and stretch out <S%H5186><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> over the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> over their rivers, <S%H2975><s%> over their streams, <S%H5104><s%> and over their pools, <S%H4723><s%> and over all their ponds <S%H98><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> that they may become blood; <S%H1818><s%> and there shall be blood <S%H1818><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both in vessels of wood <S%H6086><s%> and in vessels of stone. <S%H68><s%>'"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh commanded; <S%H6680><s%> and he lifted up <S%H7311><s%> the rod, <S%H4294><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> that were in the river, <S%H2975><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of his servants; <S%H5650><s%> and all the waters <S%H4325><s%> that were in the river <S%H2975><s%> were turned <S%H2015><s%> to blood. <S%H1818><s%>

The fish <S%H1710><s%> that were in the river <S%H2975><s%> died; <S%H4191><s%> and the river <S%H2975><s%> became foul, <S%H887><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> couldn't <S%H3201><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from the river; <S%H2975><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> was throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

The magicians <S%H2748><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the same thing with their enchantments; <S%H3909><s%> and Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> and he didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to them; <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh had spoken. <S%H1696><s%>
Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> into his house, <S%H1004><s%> and he didn't <S%H7896><s%> even take this <S%H2063><s%> to heart. <S%H3820><s%>

All the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> dug <S%H2658><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the river <S%H2975><s%> for water <S%H4325><s%> to drink; <S%H8354><s%> for they couldn't <S%H3201><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the river. <S%H2975><s%>
Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> were fulfilled, <S%H4390><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had struck <S%H5221><s%> the river. <S%H2975><s%>
